name: Travel, Explore, Eat, & Shop in Helsinki, Finland for a day
description: Helsinki is full of places where you can see a variety of beautiful landmarks, classical style buildings, places to eat traditional Finnish cuisine, & huge shopping malls to shop. We will visit these places by using the public transportations available in Helsinki. I will guide you every step of the way. For one day, we will travel, explore, eat, & shop in Helsinki, Finland. You will have the most unforgettable Finnish experience you can ever imagine.
